testimonials.client_feedback: When i was initially introduced to Ms Lakshmi and gave my suggestions about my website outlook, she matched my website as per my expectations. Very professional. I am happy with the overall experience and will surely suggest to everyone.

recog.desc: Recognized and awarded for my contibution towards various projects as a frontend developer.

Lakshmi started working on FNHW projects as chart developer and later she had taken ownership of dashboards and delivered it on time. She is a quick learner and always adds value to her work. Lakshmi's expertise in UI helped us to deliver the quality dashboard. Lakshmi's work on JPHIEGO project is also commendable.
